item.description:
Bigger bus, lower price! For only $85.00 you can join us for a full day adventure!

We've been upgraded to a 23 seat brand new bus so we get to lower the price for you! Join us for a guided tour full of Waterfalls and Vistas during this peak foliage time in the beautiful Blackstone Valley

2010 Fall - Waterfalls and Vistas - Photography Adventure - Saturday October 16, 2010
Rain date - Sunday, October 17 (will have to be very rainy for us to postpone to the rain date)

Link through here for all the details and lots more pictures of the Valley!


http://www.lamichprod...

Space is limited. Let us know now so we can hold your seat!

Michelle Fontaine
LaMich Productions
67 Island Rd., Douglas, MA 01516
508-769-9137
www.lamichproductions.com
www.facebook.com/lamichphotography

Details found here
item.how_to_find_us: BIG bus in empty parking lot will be easy to spot!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Waterfalls and Vistas - Photography Adventure
